4 weeks in, and I still love the feeling *after* each Couch to 5k session. Every week brings achievable challenges. Big thanks to @bigmediumjosh for the inspiration to try, from me, very much a non-runner. (And to you too, @benpbarnett) Still a way to go. (Heavy) Baby steps.
